account.first_policy: I understand that I may NOT upload ANY content that I do not own and have copyright to. I understand that such activity may have serious legal implications and can result in my account being terminated without notice.
account.second_policy: I understand that I may NOT upload any content that is currently on Shutterstock, AdobeStock, Pond5, Vimeo agency sites as this is a breach of the Terms and Conditions of BlackBox membership.
account.third_policy: I understand and agree that after I upload content to BlackBox that I may NOT upload the same content to the Shutterstock, AdobeStock, Pond5, Vimeo agent sites as this is a breach of the Terms and Conditions of BlackBox membership.
account.four_policy_1: I understand and agree that once I have uploaded content to BlackBox that the individual clip(s) may not be removed from the BlackBox Platform for at least
account.four_policy_2: months as this is the minimum period of time for market viability.
account.title_change_avatar: Your avatar is displayed throughout the site. You can change it as often as you'd like. (File formats accepted: JPEG, JPG and PNG)
account.password_validate: Passwords must contain at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers.
account.earing_my_footage_label: Notify me when I receive earnings from my footage
account.earing_shared_footage_label: Notify me when I receive earnings from my shared footage
account.chat_email_notify_label: Notify me via email about any new chat message from Virtual Studio Collaboration projects
account.forget_password_desc: Enter your e-mail address below to reset your password.
account.telephone_minlength: Telephone should be at least 10 digits
account.HST_registration_number_invalid: HST Registration Number must be numeric.
account.delelte_social_media: Do you really want to delete Social Media
account.about_us_note: Want to know more about BlackBox before you register? Visit our website here
account.register_note: 1) After you register please allow for 24-48 hours for us to review your registration and send your confirmation email.
account.register_note2: 2) When you get your confirmation email it will include a temporary password. Login to portal.blackbox.global using this temporary password and make the necessary account changes (Payout Name, NEW PASSWORD) and AGREE to the GENERAL RIGHTS AGREEMENT.
account.register_note3: 3) Ensure that one of your roles is CURATOR if you want to CURATE (Edit, Tag, Keyword, colour correct etc.) content for other members and to be considered for curation invitations in our MARKETPLACE.
account.payout_number: Payout Number should be at least 13 digits number
account.business_ID_desc: Please upload a piece of business issued photo ID. For business provide government registration document or business license (Your document will be deleted after the review to protect your privacy).
account.notice_dec: Successfully registered, we will send you an email confirming your registration. Please allow for 24-48 hours for us to review your registration
account.government_ID_desc: Please upload a piece of government issued photo ID. For business provide government registration document or business license (Your document will be deleted after the review to protect your privacy).
account.about_description_error: The bio description is too short please provide more info.
account.portfolio_link_placeholder: Provide a Youtube or Vimeo  demo reel link.
account.demo_reel_help_text: Please Provide a ***YouTube or Vimeo*** link to your 2-3 minute long DEMO REEL. This DEMO REEL should demonstrate your ability to create diverse, professional, compelling and marketable video content. We get many applications every day so we really need your DEMO REEL to be simple, comprehensive and succinct. Note that your DEMO REEL link will be used in your BlackBox profile so that other members will be able to learn more about your capabilities as a potential collaborator.
account.social_link_placeholder: Provide clickable link starting with http:// or https://  or www.
account.HST_registration_number_placeholder: If you are HST registered, please provide the registration number.
account.i_am_sharing_placeholder: Full name or email of an existing Blackbox member.
account.bio_question_1: How long have you been doing video related work?
account.bio_question_2: What training and certification do you have?
account.bio_question_4: Tell us about your experience as a creator?
account.bio_question_5: What are your goals as a creator?
account.bio_desc: Please answer the following questions. This information will be used as your BIO on the BlackBox platform. If you do not have an answer you can enter N/A.

age_label: I am 18 years of age or older
government_ID_desc: A piece of government photo ID (document). For business provide government registration document or business license (this will be reviewed and will never be stored online in order to protect your privacy).
about_description: Please write a paragraph telling us more about you as a content creator and why you want to join BlackBox. (Be concise as this will be used as part of our decision making process).
your_answer: Provide additional info for your above answer
paypal_tooltip: Payout Name is Usually the email address you use for PayPal. We’ll need this when it’s time to send you your BlackBox earnings

dashboard.available_opportunities_tooltip: “Available opportunities” indicate number of projects that you can choose to accept as curator or show interest to participate in a project. If you click “Become Curator” or “Interest” or “Clear” button then number of “Available opportunities” indicator will be different than what shown in Marketplace.
dashboard.outstanding_collaborative_invitations_to: “Outstanding collaborative invitations” indicate number of projects directly requested to you. If you have accepted/declined or the owner has not approved yet then the number of “Outstanding collaborative invitations” indicator might be different than what shown in the Marketplace.
dashboard.curation_pop_desc: You can configure this option only if one of your expertise roles is a curator

footage.notify_metadata_tagging_dec:
The project is available in MY COLLABORATION area. Please complete the project details and/or do the final submission.
Please note that you either upload the content to the project folder on the FTP site (which will be assigned to the agreed curator automatically) or use the already-uploaded content to assign to the curator once that curator agrees to work on the project.
footage.notify_dec:
The project is available in MY COLLABORATION area. Please complete the project details and/or do the final submission.

Please note that your curated content will be uploaded by the curator into your workspace, and you then need to do your own meta-data tagging or assign another curator for this task.
footage.confirm_dec: You need to complete the upload by clicking on the “Upload”  button before closing or closing it without the actual upload.
